text: Mattu ibrahimarannu avara odeyanu (allahanu) kelavu adesagala mulaka pariksege olapadisidaga, avaru avugalannu purnavagi palisidaru. (Allahanu avarodane) ‘‘nanu nim'mannu ella manavara nayakanagi nemisaliddene’’ endaga avaru ‘‘mattu nanna santatiyavarannu (nayakaragisuveya?)’’ Endu kelidaru. Aga avanu (allahanu) ‘‘nanna vagdanavu akramigalige anvayavaguvudilla’’ endanu
